title: Poison Elves: Parintachin
description: Inside the mind of the Elvin, assassin, Lusiphur roams the devilish imp Parintachin! When a sinister sideshow rolls into town huntung Luse, Parintachin alone must save him...if only he could keep his eyes off the feisty female imp, Charzin. This sexy demon-dame might be a little too much for our hero to handle! This work is a perfect blend of mirth and the macabre, exploring the power, desires, loneliness, and devotion of Lusiphur's most madcap friend.
